mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOOK_INFO_TBL ORDER BY BOOK_KEY DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_INFO_TBL(book_key, book_reg_no, book_title, book_author, book_publisher) VALUES(#{book_key}, #{book_reg_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{book_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{book_author, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{book_publisher, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_INFO_TBL SET book_key = #{book_key}, book_reg_no = #{book_reg_no}, book_title = #{book_title}, book_author = #{book_author}, book_publisher = #{book_publisher} WHERE book_key = #{book_key}
